name: アルカナリッター
description:
■It is the long piece RPG-like volume which is 30-40 hours at ■ whole book 52 episodes + quest map, total play time before downloading a game.

■Summary ■
Genre simulation RPG
Tool, rpgmaker VX
Play time around .35 hours

■Game contents ■
The prince of the kingdom where the mother country was destroyed by the empire lifts up the military from the exile and. It becomes a playing royal road-like story to confront the empire, and to regain the mother country.

■System ■
A turn is a game moving a unit by turns on the field of the chapter form. I bring up a unit by a subevent, and being enough is possible. It is completely equipped with the short cut systems such as a forwarding function and a message skip, the cut of the read scenario, too.
